title: A critical review on the production and upgradation of sustainable biocrude from hydrothermal liquefaction of Canadian-grown agricultural biomass
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00527A, Review Article
Vasu Chaudhary, Sreenavya Awadakkam, Venu Babu Borugadda, Ajay K. Dalai
Oxygenated biocrude produced from hydrothermal liquefaction is of great interest as it originated from renewable feedstocks.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
